name: chicken_1
query: FROM logs-* | INSIST_üêî agent.id | EVAL col0 = COALESCE(agent.id, "") | WHERE MATCH(message, "204.188.85.203") and col0 == "703ef3bd-dc06-4c6c-a621-13c89245e6b0"

name: chicken_2
query: FROM logs-* | INSIST_üêî kubernetes.container.image |  EVAL col0 = COALESCE(kubernetes.container.image, "") | WHERE col0 != "" | STATS col1 = COUNT() BY col0,data_stream.dataset

name: chicken_3
query: FROM logs-* | INSIST_üêî agent.id | STATS c=count() BY agent.id, data_stream.dataset | SORT c DESC

name: chicken_3_with_where
query: FROM logs-* | INSIST_üêî agent.id | EVAL end_time = DATE_PARSE("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'","{{ bulk_end_date }}") | WHERE @timestamp >= end_time - 1 hour | STATS c=count() BY agent.id, data_stream.dataset | SORT c DESC

name: chicken_4
query: FROM logs-* | INSIST_üêî agent.hostname | EVAL col0 = COALESCE(agent.hostname, "") | WHERE col0 ==  "elasticsearch-ci-immutable-centos-7-1599241536066250344"
